snippet: Prosecutors said that they had detained an ex-member of a defunct party on charges of breaking an anti-communist law with comments about North Korea.
abstract: South Korean prosecutors say they have arrested Hwang Sun, erstwhile member of defunct left-wing political party, on charges of flouting anti-communist law with supporting remarks about North Korea.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors said that they had detained an ex-member of a defunct party on charges of breaking an anti-communist law with comments about North Korea.

headline.main: South Korean Activist Is Arrested Over Remarks About North
headline.print_headline: South Korean Activist Is Arrested Over Remarks About North
